title: Infinitycredit
author: Infinitycredit
content: Revolutuinary way to borrow funds.We give you line of credit no collateral needed no questions asked.Every time when you pay back at least something you can borrow more we do it exacly the way how our world works fed printing money endless and old debt not payed you can still borrow more as longes you pay back something. It's great way to enrich all of us it's relaxed way you can borrow without liabilities or personal responsebility.At the moment you can only borrow trx tron.You Open line of credit with 3% intrest rate monthly If you can't pay back full ammount then you must pay back at least 50% funds you borrowed and then your intrest rate will increase but you can borrow more still.We do it exacly how our world financial system works and this way those who got access in this they make rich with money without any of personal liabilities thanks to crypto now thanks to us the poor uneducated people can have same way to the endless credit.We Will have soon our Telegram Channel where you can Open your line of credit so more you pay back the more you can borrow.Im sure you are exited about it.

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: Quote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 10:15:34 AMWe give you line of credit no collateral needed no questions asked.Sounds great, so let's get started.Loan Amount: 6mil TRX (6.000.000)Date of Repayment: Indefinitely (but will always repay something)TRX Address: Will be provided after the loan approval.Thanks in advance!

comments.author: Infinitycredit
comments.body: Quote from: condoras on July 29, 2023, 01:49:51 PMQuote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 10:15:34 AMWe give you line of credit no collateral needed no questions asked.Sounds great, so let's get started.Loan Amount: 6mil TRX (6.000.000)Date of Repayment: Indefinitely (but will always repay something)TRX Address: Will be provided after the loan approval.Thanks in advance! Yes we just copy paste the wall Street fed and bankers activity.But wait for when our Telegram official link Will be ready so you can Open your line of credit there.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 02:43:04 PMBut wait for when our Telegram official link Will be ready so you can Open your line of credit there.I have some questions:1. What's required to open a line of credit?2. Do you have a secure web portal where I can login and manage my account?3. Is there a minimum or maximum limit to what I can borrow?4. When will the official Telegram link be ready?Quote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 10:15:34 AMIm sure you are exited about it.Indeed.

comments.author: Infinitycredit
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 29, 2023, 03:25:31 PMQuote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 02:43:04 PMBut wait for when our Telegram official link Will be ready so you can Open your line of credit there.I have some questions:1. What's required to open a line of credit?2. Do you have a secure web portal where I can login and manage my account?3. Is there a minimum or maximum limit to what I can borrow?4. When will the official Telegram link be ready?Quote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 10:15:34 AMIm sure you are exited about it.Indeed.  1. Cryptocurrency wallet. 2. No just Telegram 3. Yes once you pay back you get access for bigger credit for first time borrowerers Will be about 50 trx only.4. We working on soon Everything Will be instant and no names or personal data asked the system will make capital flowing and Will enrich everybody who's using it.If you pay back the old Loans then you get new credit with bigger ammount and with lower intrest % General terms you borrow for 30 days 3% intrest rate. If you pay back at least 50% you can get same ammount as previous loan If you back 100% including intrest % your credit limit Will be increased 100%  everytime when you can't pay back your intrest % Will be double the next month.As longes you pay 50% back money you borrowed you can still access to credit.Any other questions or suggestions you Are feel Free to ask here.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 04:39:25 PMEverything Will be instant and no names or personal data asked the system will make capital flowing and Will enrich everybody who's using it.If you pay back the old Loans then you get new credit with bigger ammount and with lower intrest % General terms you borrow for 30 days 3% intrest rate. If you pay back at least 50% you can get same ammount as previous loan If you back 100% including intrest % your credit limit Will be increased 100%  everytime when you can't pay back your intrest % Will be double the next month.As longes you pay 50% back money you borrowed you can still access to credit.Any other questions or suggestions you Are feel Free to ask here.This is a too good to be true requirements and terms for someone that will offer loan on trust basis since this is online which borrowers is completely anonymous. There’s surely a catch on this in able to make a loan aside from you mention here.Typically, lenders needs to guarantee that borrowers will pay loan by requiring collateral or ID. Your requirements is very lousy and I doubt a serious lending business will offer this kind a too good to be true terms for borrowers. What’s the catch here?

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 04:39:25 PMQuote from: DireWolfM14 on July 29, 2023, 03:25:31 PMI have some questions:1. What's required to open a line of credit?2. Do you have a secure web portal where I can login and manage my account?3. Is there a minimum or maximum limit to what I can borrow?4. When will the official Telegram link be ready?1. Cryptocurrency wallet. 2. No just Telegram 3. Yes once you pay back you get access for bigger credit for first time borrowerers Will be about 50 trx only.4. We working on soon 1. Excellent.2. Sketchy.3. $4?4. Can't wait. Quote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 04:39:25 PMEverything Will be instant and no names or personal data asked the system will make capital flowing and Will enrich everybody who's using it.If you pay back the old Loans then you get new credit with bigger ammount and with lower intrest % General terms you borrow for 30 days 3% intrest rate. If you pay back at least 50% you can get same ammount as previous loan If you back 100% including intrest % your credit limit Will be increased 100%  everytime when you can't pay back your intrest % Will be double the next month.As longes you pay 50% back money you borrowed you can still access to credit.Any other questions or suggestions you Are feel Free to ask here.So, every time I borrow and payback a loan (with interest,) I can them borrow twice the amount next time?  That's great.  I'll borrow $4 today, and payback $4.004 worth of TRX tomorrow (that's the principle plus 0.1% interest, your daily rate.)  Once I pay back tomorrow I'll borrow $8, and pay back $8.008 on Monday.  I'll keep this up for the next thirty days, at which point I'll have developed enough credit to borrow $4.3 billion worth of TRX.  This is the best service EVER!  Please, please let's start now.  I mean really, what could go wrong?

You borrow 100$ you pay back with % you can get to borrow 200$ you pay that back with % you get to borrow 400$ ...

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: What a load of bullshit. I'm not even surprised by the bullshit I see on the forums any more, and on this board I see a few but this is the last straw, instead of a crude attempt to scam, the OP has devised an ideal system for him or his "team" to be scammed (I say "team" since he speaks in the plural).Sounds to me like a teenager writing from his mum's basement all excited because he thought he found a great idea to get rich:Quote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 02:43:04 PMYes we just copy paste the wall Street fed and bankers activity.

You borrow 100$ you pay back with % you can get to borrow 200$ you pay that back with % you get to borrow 400$ ... comments.body: Quote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 10:15:34 AMRevolutuinaryIt's always a great idea to start your billion dollar business with a word that doesn't exist.QuoteWe give you line of credit no collateral needed no questions asked.Every time when you pay back at least something you can borrow more we do it exacly the way how our world works fed printing money endless and old debt not payed you can still borrow more as longes you pay back something.I'm still not sure if you're mocking the fiat system, or trying to scam people. Or both. I'm kidding, you're not bright enough to mock the fiat system, which means you're trying to scam people.Quote from: condoras on July 29, 2023, 01:49:51 PMLoan Amount: 6mil TRX (6.000.000)Date of Repayment: Indefinitely (but will always repay something)Only 6 million? That's no Wall Street thinking, think bigger Quote from: Infinitycredit on July 29, 2023, 04:39:25 PM3.
